g.text: This is not custom-built. It is a container
A lightweight webhook event service. Automates
This is not custom-built. It is a container
A Hugo Theme build server. Generates JSON payloads
that Hugo consumes to add pre-calculated content
to the final static site output.
Currently adds backlink support to the website by
aggregating all references to other pages.
Admin creates short-lived chat rooms with
one-time invites for live discussion. Fills
a gap between long-term comments or emails
An interactive web frontend for a Ledger CLI
journal. Sensitive journal and account data
This is not custom-built. It is a container
stores all your account and ledger entries
A lightweight static-site pluggable comment engine.
This is not custom-built. It is a container
A private self-hosted static site client
and service publishing tool. Only partially
explicitly with the chaos-theme Hugo theme
